title: I can barely hear calls
content:
My 1st Gen Pixel has a problem with the speaker when making calls. I can hear the other side, but the sound is very faint. The voice is very, very low and sounds crackly, distorted and like the other side is under water.

This problem is when using the handset in a normal configuration. When I place the call on loudspeaker, I can hear the other side normally.

The phone has not been dropped, nor has it been wet.

How can I fix this? I believe my phone is under warranty. I am in Brazil.
